parse: Conjunctive waw, Preposition-m | Noun - masculine plural construct

str2: Elam -- a son of Shem, also his descendants and their country
Mattaniah -- 'gift of Yah', the last king of Judah, also a number of Israelites
Zachariah -- the name of a number of Israelites

str2: Jehiel -- 'may God live', the name of a number of Israelites

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular

str2: Jeremoth -- the name of a number of Israelites

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Elijah -- 'Yah is God', a well-known prophet of Israel, also three other Israelites
